user.title: Connect to Emby Server
user.description: Enter your Emby server connection details.

data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of your Emby server (e.g., 192.168.1.100 or emby.local)

user_select.title: Select User
user_select.description: Select a user context for {server_name}. Choose 'Use admin context' to use the API key without a specific user.

entity_options.title: Entity Naming Options
entity_options.description: Configure how entity names appear for {server_name}. By default, device names are prefixed with 'Emby' (e.g., 'Emby Living Room TV'). You can disable this for cleaner names.

data_description.prefix_media_player: When enabled, media player device names will start with 'Emby' (e.g., 'Emby Living Room TV')
data_description.prefix_notify: When enabled, notification devices will have 'Emby' prefix

data_description.prefix_button: When enabled, server action buttons will have 'Emby' prefix

init.title: Opciones de Emby
init.description: Configurar ajustes opcionales para la integración de Emby.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the Emby server for updates (5-300 seconds)
data_description.enable_websocket: Use WebSocket for real-time updates (reduces polling)
data_description.websocket_interval: How often the WebSocket requests session updates from Emby (500-10000ms, default: 1500)
data_description.ignored_devices: Comma-separated list of device names to ignore (e.g., 'Server, Backup Device')
data_description.ignore_web_players: Hide media players from web browser sessions (Emby Web, Chrome, Firefox, etc.)
data_description.video_container: Preferred video container format for transcoding
data_description.transcoding_profile: Device profile for format negotiation (universal, chromecast, roku, appletv, audio_only)
data_description.max_video_bitrate: Maximum video bitrate for transcoding (leave empty for unlimited)
data_description.max_audio_bitrate: Maximum audio bitrate for transcoding (leave empty for unlimited)
data_description.prefix_media_player: When enabled, device names will start with 'Emby' (e.g., 'Emby Living Room TV')
data_description.prefix_notify: When enabled, notification entities will have 'Emby' prefix in their device names
data_description.prefix_remote: When enabled, remote entities will have 'Emby' prefix in their device names
data_description.prefix_button: When enabled, button entities will have 'Emby' prefix in their device names
data_description.enable_discovery_sensors: Create sensors for Next Up, Continue Watching, Recently Added, and Suggestions (requires a user to be selected)
